name: Cloth Baby Shoes - Pretty Shoes
description:
***PRETTY SHOES*** :-)

Innovation, fashion and design come together to bring you a stunning statement of design, style and comfortness to your baby. Ready for a pair of baby shoes whose sophisticated design makes the rest of the nursery envious? Here they are. Each one of my shoes are sewn with lots and lots of love. I can always customize any size for you. Just convo me and I will make sure to deliver my creation completely customized for you and, that is not all - at no extra cost. Each one of them are made with 3 layers of fabric that includes a interfacing fabric and 100% cotton for maximum comfort for the walking feet. 
I will be adding different models every week. I love to create! If you order 3 different pairs at once I will send you a gift for free, a very cute carrying case that is also a baby necessaire, pacifier holder and can also be used as a changing pad and an emergency burping cloth! (*patent pending). How cool is that? Once again, I love to create :-)
Please come back and shop more!! 
XOXO Laupinkgirl :-)

After ordering, just send me a message specifying the size you want.
SHOES SIZES:
Newborn (fits up to 2 months)
0-3 Months
3-6 Months
6-9 Months
9-12 Months
12-18 Months
* If you're not sure sure about the size needed, order a bigger one. As the shoes are made to order, I do not accept any returns unless it's defective.
** Shoes may look different from the picture because they will be made to order unless stated otherwise and they are handmade, OOAK (One Of A Kind) and the fabric is always cut from different parts of the yardage).

name: Cloth Baby Shoes - Precious Zebra
description:
***THIS MODEL COMES WITH THE WATER BOTTLE SHOWN ON THE PICTURES!!! *** :-)

Going Jogging with your baby? Don't forget to bring your Water Bottle Carrying Case! Simply attach it to the stroller by using the velcro! Or use it as a Diaper case, Super useful!

Innovation, fashion and design come together to bring you a stunning statement of design, style and comfortness to your baby. Please come back and shop more!!

SHOES SIZES:
Newborn (fits up to 2 months)
0-3 Months
3-6 Months
6-9 Months
9-12 Months
12-18 Months
* If you're not sure sure about the size needed, order a bigger one. As the shoes are made to order, I do not accept any returns unless it's defective.
** Shoes may look different from the picture because they will be made to order unless stated otherwise and they are handmade, OOAK (One Of A Kind) and the fabric is always cut from different parts of the yardage).
*** The Water Bottle Case is made from a Pattern by Simplicity adapted by Laupinkgirl.
